name: Apartments at Glen Isla

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very quiet apartments 5mins drive (or 25mins walk) from the centre of Cowes. Rooms are very clean and have all the standard facilities. Hosts very helpful. Internet access via wifi is $5.
reviews.title: Good, clean, quiet holiday apartments

reviews.text: We only stayed for one night as we were off to see the little penguins. There was 3 of us staying the apartment it could have slept 5 it would have been a little cramped but still great. The location is about 5 minutes drive from Cowes main street. I would recommend and stay there again.
reviews.title: A Good Little Find

reviews.text: We were lucky enough to book this wonderful accomodation for our family of three...two adults and a baby. The rooms were the cleanest we have stayed in! The hosts, Shirley and David were warm, inviting and informative...spa, swimming pool and sauna allowed us to have a wonderful relaxing time (even with a baby) a short stroll to the beach and this fab. cafe ...would recommend.
reviews.title: Tranquil and well positioned

aka: Apartments At Glen Isla Phillip Island/Cowes
